original: @63a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @63a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: krishna ya m'a ri kro dha r'a dza ba tra sa ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: krishna ya m'a ri kro dha r'a dza ba tra sa ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Kṛṣṇayamārikrodharājarāvaṇasādhananāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed nag po dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Wrathful King Kṛṣṇayamāri, Who Reaches the End of Time, Called “The Means of Accomplishment”

original: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: Homage to the Blessed Yamāri.

original: / spros bral thugs su chud bdag 'gro ba kun khyab pa //
analyzed: / spros bral thugs su chud bdag 'gro ba kun khyab pa //
translated: You who have realized freedom from elaborations, you who pervade all beings,

original: ma lus bdud 'joms thogs med khro bo kun gyi gtso //
analyzed: ma lus bdud 'joms thogs med khro bo kun gyi gtso //
translated: You who conquer all māras without exception, you who are the foremost of all wrathful ones,

original: padma rdo rje snyoms 'jug zhi bde mdzes pas bsgyings //
analyzed: padma rdo rje snyoms 'jug zhi bde mdzes pas bsgyings //
translated: You who are graceful with the beauty of peace and bliss through the union of lotus and vajra,

original: longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhengs pa'i snying po la btud de //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhengs pa'i snying po la btud de //
translated: I bow to the essence of the sambhogakāya form.

original: sangs rgyas thugs kyi rgyud rgyal 'bum pa thu bo che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thugs kyi rgyud rgyal 'bum pa thu bo che //
translated: The king of the mind tantras of the Buddha, the great hundred thousand,

original: na da ku be ra la yab kyis rjes gdams shing //
analyzed: na da ku be ra la yab kyis rjes gdams shing //
translated: Was taught by the father to Nāgārjuna,

original: de yis de nyid bsdus pa'i byang chub sems chen po'i //
analyzed: de yis de nyid bsdus pa'i byang chub sems chen po'i //
translated: And by him, the great mind of awakening of the Compendium of Reality

original: rnam par rgyal ba gshed rgyud las byung bshad par bya //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba gshed rgyud las byung bshad par bya //
translated: Was taught in the Kṛṣṇayamāri Tantra.

original: 'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po ste //
analyzed: 'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po ste //
translated: All beings have the essence of buddhahood.

original: gtso bo mi yang dad ldan brtan //
analyzed: gtso bo mi yang dad ldan brtan //
translated: The chief person is faithful and stable.

original: ral gri padma skyon med gnas //
analyzed: ral gri padma skyon med gnas //
translated: The sword is in the faultless lotus.

original: cod pan brgyan pa mthong bar bya //
analyzed: cod pan brgyan pa mthong bar bya //
translated: One should see the crown ornament.

original: mtha' yang mi gnas gtso bo la //
analyzed: mtha' yang mi gnas gtso bo la //
translated: The chief one does not abide in the end.

original: dmigs dang padmos rjes bzung nas //
analyzed: dmigs dang padmos rjes bzung nas //
translated: Having been accepted by the lotus of the first visualization,

original: rgyal por dran pa byas nas kyang //
analyzed: rgyal por dran pa byas nas kyang //
translated: and having made mindfulness the king,

original: lhag pa'i lha rnams spyan drang ngo //
analyzed: lhag pa'i lha rnams spyan drang ngo //
translated: one should invite the supreme deity.

original: rnam dag bdun gyis sbyangs pa la //
analyzed: rnam dag bdun gyis sbyangs pa la //
translated: Having purified with the seven purities,

original: tshangs pa bzhi yi sems gnas nas //
analyzed: tshangs pa bzhi yi sems gnas nas //
translated: and having stabilized the mind with the four brahmavihāras,

original: 'phrog pa med pa'i snying po nyid //
analyzed: 'phrog pa med pa'i snying po nyid //
translated: the essence that is not to be stolen

original: thog mtha' med pa dmigs par bya //
analyzed: thog mtha' med pa dmigs par bya //
translated: is visualized as being without beginning or end.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: oṃ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako ’haṃ

original: yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of the three syllables

original: bde gsal stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: bde gsal stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: is the nature of bliss, clarity, and emptiness.

original: thog mtha' med nas sems can la //
analyzed: thog mtha' med nas sems can la //
translated: Since it has existed in sentient beings without beginning or end,

original: gnas phyir rig pa nyams mi bya //
analyzed: gnas phyir rig pa nyams mi bya //
translated: do not let the awareness degenerate.

original: h'um las re pha byung nas su //
analyzed: h'um las re pha byung nas su //
translated: From hūṃ, a rekhā arises,

original: nyi @63b dkyil rdo rje 'khor lo bsgom //
analyzed: nyi @63b dkyil rdo rje 'khor lo bsgom //
translated: and one should meditate on a sun maṇḍala and a vajra wheel.

original: de rjes h'um las h'um byung ste //
analyzed: de rjes h'um las h'um byung ste //
translated: Then, from the HŪM there comes a HŪM,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' chos 'byung gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' chos 'byung gnas //
translated: Vajrasattva, the source of the sphere of reality,

original: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar ldan //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar ldan //
translated: endowed with the seal of body, speech, and mind,

original: padma rdo rjes mtshan byas pa'o //
analyzed: padma rdo rjes mtshan byas pa'o //
translated: marked with a lotus and a vajra.

original: gong mtshungs bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: gong mtshungs bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
translated: The celestial mansion is the same as above, from the BHRŪM.

original: aom las rtag pa sna tshogs mnyam //
analyzed: aom las rtag pa sna tshogs mnyam //
translated: From the OṂ, the eternal, various, and equal,

original: gdan ni rjes mthun gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gdan ni rjes mthun gnas pa'o //
translated: the seat is in accordance with the place.

original: aa las mar ldan nyi ma zla //
analyzed: aa las mar ldan nyi ma zla //
translated: From the A, the sun and moon are endowed with the moon.

original: mnyam pa h'um las rdo rje ste //
analyzed: mnyam pa h'um las rdo rje ste //
translated: The equal HŪM is the vajra,

original: sku yi gzi brjid bsdus nga rgyal //
analyzed: sku yi gzi brjid bsdus nga rgyal //
translated: the pride of the collected splendor of the body.

original: rgyud gshed rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgom //
analyzed: rgyud gshed rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the tantric deity Vajradhara.

original: phab pa'i sbyor ldan byang chub sems //
analyzed: phab pa'i sbyor ldan byang chub sems //
translated: The bodhicitta endowed with the union of descent

original: yongs 'gyur thabs dang shes rab sku //
analyzed: yongs 'gyur thabs dang shes rab sku //
translated: is the transformed body of method and wisdom.

original: yig 'bru lnga yis gang ba las //
analyzed: yig 'bru lnga yis gang ba las //
translated: It is filled with the five seed syllables.

original: 'phros pa'i lha mos bskul nas bzhengs //🔽chos kun bdag pos bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 'phros pa'i lha mos bskul nas bzhengs // chos kun bdag pos bsgom par bya //
translated: The goddesses emanating from that exhort him to arise.🔽Meditate on the lord of all phenomena.

original: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ dharmadhātu svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ

original: ya las skyes pa'i gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: ya las skyes pa'i gshin rje gshed //
translated: From the YA, Yamāntaka is born,

original: aindra n'i la'i mdog 'dra ba //
analyzed: aindra n'i la'i mdog 'dra ba //
translated: the color of sapphire.

original: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar phag mos 'khril //🔽ma he ser skya la bskum brkyang //
analyzed: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar phag mos 'khril // ma he ser skya la bskum brkyang //
translated: He is embraced by Vārāhī, white on the right, red on the left.🔽He is standing with one leg bent, the other extended, on a pale buff bull.

original: g-yas pa gri gug g-yon thod pa //
analyzed: g-yas pa gri gug g-yon thod pa //
translated: He holds a flaying knife in his right hand and a skull cup in his left.

original: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo pad //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo pad //
translated: He has a vajra, a sword, a wheel, and a lotus.

original: thod pa lnga yis dbu brgyan cing //
analyzed: thod pa lnga yis dbu brgyan cing //
translated: He is adorned with five skulls and

original: dbu skyes gyen 'greng brgyad kyis brgyan //
analyzed: dbu skyes gyen 'greng brgyad kyis brgyan //
translated: eight upward-streaming locks of hair.

original: rlon pa khrag 'dzag lnga bcu 'phyang //
analyzed: rlon pa khrag 'dzag lnga bcu 'phyang //
translated: He hangs fifty fresh, bloody heads.

original: me dpung nang na gnas par bsgom //
analyzed: me dpung nang na gnas par bsgom //
translated: Meditate on him dwelling in a mass of fire.

original: rang mtshungs ye shes sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: rang mtshungs ye shes sems dpa' ni //
translated: The gnosis being, similar to oneself,

original: cho ga gsum dang ldan pas so ;
analyzed: cho ga gsum dang ldan pas so ;
translated: is created through the three rites.

original: / yi ge lnga rdzogs de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: / yi ge lnga rdzogs de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The five syllables are the perfect tathāgatas,

original: rigs kyi mdog dang mtshun mar ldan //
analyzed: rigs kyi mdog dang mtshun mar ldan //
translated: endowed with the colors and hand implements of the families.

original: sku ni mtho gang tshad yin te //
analyzed: sku ni mtho gang tshad yin te //
translated: The body is the size of a cubit,

original: phra mo lnga ni tshon gang ngo //
analyzed: phra mo lnga ni tshon gang ngo //
translated: and the five subtle [bodies] are the size of a finger.

original: sku gsum rab tu thob bya'i phyir //
analyzed: sku gsum rab tu thob bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to attain the three bodies,

original: lus ngag yid gsum byin brlab bya //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum byin brlab bya //
translated: bless the body, speech, and mind.

original: spyi gtsug rtag pa'i rgyal po ste //
analyzed: spyi gtsug rtag pa'i rgyal po ste //
translated: At the crown is the king of permanence,

original: mgrin par rdo rje nyi ma bsgom //
analyzed: mgrin par rdo rje nyi ma bsgom //
translated: at the throat is meditate on Vajrasūrya,

original: snying gar mi bskyod rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: snying gar mi bskyod rdo rje 'chang //
translated: at the heart is Akṣobhya Vajradhara.

original: aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ.🔽

original: mig la sa yi snying po ste //
analyzed: mig la sa yi snying po ste //
translated: In the eyes is Kshitigarbha,

original: rna ba la ni rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: rna ba la ni rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: in the ears is Vajrapani,

original: sna la nam mkha'i snying po mchog / lce la 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon //
analyzed: sna la nam mkha'i snying po mchog / lce la 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon //
translated: in the nose is the supreme Akashagarbha, in the tongue is Lokeshvara,

original: sgrib pa rnam sel lus la dgod //
analyzed: sgrib pa rnam sel lus la dgod //
translated: in the body is Avalokita,

original: kun du bzang po yid kyi'o //
analyzed: kun du bzang po yid kyi'o //
translated: and in the mind is Samantabhadra.

original: kshim dzim kham gam kam sam //
analyzed: kshim dzim kham gam kam sam //
translated: KSHIM JIM KHAM GHAM KAM SAM

original: cho ga gsum dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: cho ga gsum dang ldan pa la //
translated: In the three rites

original: aom dang h'um gis spel bar bya //
analyzed: aom dang h'um gis spel bar bya //
translated: one should add O and HUM.

original: rdo rje lnga ni mchod byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje lnga ni mchod byas la //
translated: Having made offerings to the five vajras,

original: gsol btab dbang gis mi bskyod 'gyur //
analyzed: gsol btab dbang gis mi bskyod 'gyur //
translated: one should supplicate, and through empowerment, become Akshobhya.

original: mi bzad rdo rje 'khor lo nyid //
analyzed: mi bzad rdo rje 'khor lo nyid //
translated: The unbearable vajra wheel

original: mchod bstod byas la dgug gzhug bya //
analyzed: mchod bstod byas la dgug gzhug bya //
translated: should be invited and seated, having been offered praise.

original: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
analyzed: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
translated: OM VAJRA SATVA SAMA YA

original: tsakra mandala dh'a tu dza: h'um ba ho: sa ma ya stvam aa nya ham /🔽aa la @64a * //
analyzed: tsakra mandala dh'a tu dza: h'um ba ho: sa ma ya stvam aa nya ham / aa la @64a * //
translated: CHAKRA MANDALA DHATU JAH HUM BHA WO SAMAYA SATVA A NYA HAM

original: la la la ho //
analyzed: la la la ho //
translated: A LA LA LA LA HO

original: aa aa aa aa /
analyzed: aa aa aa aa /
translated: A A A A

original: rdo rje nam mkha' byin rlabs la //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' byin rlabs la //
translated: In the blessing of vajra space,

original: bskyod pas lnga 'gyur byang chub sems //
analyzed: bskyod pas lnga 'gyur byang chub sems //
translated: through shaking, the fivefold bodhicitta

original: mkha' yi padmar rdzus skyes nas //
analyzed: mkha' yi padmar rdzus skyes nas //
translated: is miraculously born in the space lotus.

original: sa dgur bskyed la rab rgyas sku //
analyzed: sa dgur bskyed la rab rgyas sku //
translated: Having generated it on the nine levels, the body is fully expanded.

original: ba spu'i bu ga che nas spro //
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga che nas spro //
translated: And the pores of his body are open.

original: sangs rgyas sprin yang rjes bsams nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sprin yang rjes bsams nas //
translated: Having contemplated the cloud of Buddhas,

original: rigs kyi don yang bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: rigs kyi don yang bsgrub par bya //
translated: One should accomplish the meaning of the family.

original: aom badzra dhrik ya h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra dhrik ya h'um /
translated: Om vajra-dhrik ya hum.

original: aom dzin dzik kshe h'um /🔽aom ratna dhrik ma h'um /
analyzed: aom dzin dzik kshe h'um / aom ratna dhrik ma h'um /
translated: Om jin-jhik kshe hum.🔽Om ratna-dhrik ma hum.

original: aom a'a ro lik me h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a ro lik me h'um /
translated: Om arolik me hum.

original: aom pra dzny'a dhrik da h'um /
analyzed: aom pra dzny'a dhrik da h'um /
translated: Om prajna-dhrik da hum.

original: shar du gti mug gshed po ste //
analyzed: shar du gti mug gshed po ste //
translated: In the east is Mohavajra,

original: lho ru nga rgyal gshed po'o //🔽nub tu 'dod chags gshed po ste //
analyzed: lho ru nga rgyal gshed po'o // nub tu 'dod chags gshed po ste //
translated: In the south is Manavajra,🔽In the west is Raktavajra,

original: byang du phrag dog gshed po'o //
analyzed: byang du phrag dog gshed po'o //
translated: And in the north is Irsyavajra.

original: shar la 'od zer gzhan rnon po //
analyzed: shar la 'od zer gzhan rnon po //
translated: In the east is another sharp-rayed one,

original: dkar ser dmar ljang rang 'od rig / rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya 'dzin //
analyzed: dkar ser dmar ljang rang 'od rig / rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya 'dzin //
translated: White, yellow, red, and green, with the insignia of the lords of the families.

original: gzhan ni go rims sbyor shes pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni go rims sbyor shes pa'o //
translated: The others are to be known in order.

original: na yo n'i ra 'phros pa las //
analyzed: na yo n'i ra 'phros pa las //
translated: From the emanation of the nadi-s,🔽The goddesses such as Tsa-tsi-ka,

original: byang chub sems kyis rab rgyas pa'i //🔽rtsa rtsi k'a sogs lha mo yis //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis rab rgyas pa'i // rtsa rtsi k'a sogs lha mo yis //
translated: Who are filled with bodhicitta,

original: mchod pas rab tu mnyes par bya //
analyzed: mchod pas rab tu mnyes par bya //
translated: Are pleased by the offerings.

original: de nas rdo rje dril 'chang bas //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dril 'chang bas //
translated: Then, holding the vajra and bell,

original: bstod pa yang ni ched du brjod //
analyzed: bstod pa yang ni ched du brjod //
translated: One should also recite the praises.

original: dam tshig bzang po byin brlabs nas //
analyzed: dam tshig bzang po byin brlabs nas //
translated: Having blessed the good commitments,

original: rdo rje h'um gis myang bar bya //🔽spro ba chen po 'jig rten khams //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um gis myang bar bya // spro ba chen po 'jig rten khams //
translated: one should taste with the vajra hūṃ.🔽Having gathered the world realms

original: thog ma med pas bsdus byas nas //
analyzed: thog ma med pas bsdus byas nas //
translated: with great enthusiasm from beginningless [time],

original: du mar brtson 'grus ldan yid kyis //
analyzed: du mar brtson 'grus ldan yid kyis //
translated: with a mind endowed with diligence in many ways,

original: yang dang yang du goms par bya //🔽rdo rje snying ga'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: yang dang yang du goms par bya // rdo rje snying ga'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: one should become familiar again and again.🔽Having arranged the mind-protecting array

original: yid skyob bkod nas bzlas par bya //
analyzed: yid skyob bkod nas bzlas par bya //
translated: in the maṇḍala of the vajra heart center, one should recite.

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat /🔽rim dang cig car sbyor ba yi //
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat / rim dang cig car sbyor ba yi //
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ṣṭṛīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ🔽One should recite for the sake of sentient beings

original: sems can don du bzlas par bya //
analyzed: sems can don du bzlas par bya //
translated: with the yoga of the sequence and instantaneously.

original: zla ba'o cog gi bcu bzhi la //
analyzed: zla ba'o cog gi bcu bzhi la //
translated: On every fourteenth day,

original: dri chus byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //🔽gru gsum ldan zhing me tog spras //
analyzed: dri chus byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni // gru gsum ldan zhing me tog spras //
translated: in a maṇḍala anointed with saffron water,🔽adorned with flowers,

original: mchod pa bzang ldan gtor mas bkang //
analyzed: mchod pa bzang ldan gtor mas bkang //
translated: filled with good offerings and bali offerings,🔽one should meditate on the head

original: mi rus lnga bcu tham pa la //
analyzed: mi rus lnga bcu tham pa la //
translated: of a human corpse smeared with blood.

original: khrag gi spangs pa'i mgo bor bsgom //🔽ri lu re la bshed nag phos //
analyzed: khrag gi spangs pa'i mgo bor bsgom // ri lu re la bshed nag phos //
translated: Having adorned each pill with a drop of blood,

original: brgyan pa khri yi bar du bzlas //
analyzed: brgyan pa khri yi bar du bzlas //
translated: one should recite up to ten thousand times.

original: mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes byas la //
analyzed: mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes byas la //
translated: Having pleased them with the offerings,

original: gsol btab gtor ma dur khrod sbyin //
analyzed: gsol btab gtor ma dur khrod sbyin //
translated: having supplicated, give the torma to the charnel grounds.

original: aom aindr'a ya hr'i:/
analyzed: aom aindr'a ya hr'i:/
translated: Oṃ indrāya hriḥ.

original: ya ma ya shtri:/
analyzed: ya ma ya shtri:/
translated: Yama yakṣa.

original: ba ru n'a ya wi /
analyzed: ba ru n'a ya wi /
translated: Varuṇāya vi.

original: ku be r'a ya kri /
analyzed: ku be r'a ya kri /
translated: Kubera yakṣa.

original: a'i shv'a n'a ya ta /
analyzed: a'i shv'a n'a ya ta /
translated: Īśāna ta.

original: aagna ye aa /
analyzed: aagna ye aa /
translated: Agni ya.

original: nee rri ta ye na /
analyzed: nee rri ta ye na /
translated: Nairṛta na.

original: b'a ye be ya na /
analyzed: b'a ye be ya na /
translated: Vāyu veya.

original: tsandr'a ya h'um /
analyzed: tsandr'a ya h'um /
translated: Candra hūṃ.

original: s'ury'a ya h'um /
analyzed: s'ury'a ya h'um /
translated: Sūrya hūṃ.

original: brahma n'a ya phat /
analyzed: brahma n'a ya phat /
translated: Brahmā phaṭ.

original: ba su dha r'a ya phat /
analyzed: ba su dha r'a ya phat /
translated: Vasudharāya phaṭ.

original: be ma tsi tra ya sv'a /
analyzed: be ma tsi tra ya sv'a /
translated: Vematsi tra svā.

original: sarba bhu te bhyo h'a /
analyzed: sarba bhu te bhyo h'a /
translated: Sarvabhūte bhyo ha.

original: hi hi hi hi h'um /
analyzed: hi hi hi hi h'um /
translated: Hi hi hi hi hūṃ.

original: phem phem phem phem phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: phem phem phem phem phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Phaṃ phaṃ phaṃ phaṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gad mo chen mo brgyad brgyad nas //
analyzed: gad mo chen mo brgyad brgyad nas //
translated: Having laughed eight times,

original: gnang ba byin nas gshegs par bsam //
analyzed: gnang ba byin nas gshegs par bsam //
translated: think that they depart, having given permission.

original: 'di ni bsnyen @64b pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsnyen @64b pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of approach.

original: srid pa gsum gyi 'khor lo ni //
analyzed: srid pa gsum gyi 'khor lo ni //
translated: The wheel of the three existences

original: dbang po skye mched stong pa yi //
analyzed: dbang po skye mched stong pa yi //
translated: is the empty sense bases and faculties,

original: lcags kyi khang pa bcu bdun gyi //
analyzed: lcags kyi khang pa bcu bdun gyi //
translated: the iron house with seventeen

original: rdo rje snying po dgod par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po dgod par bya //
translated: should be placed with the vajra essence.🔽The water maṇḍala is like a chariot,

original: chu yi dkyil 'khor shing rta dang // ce spyang rgyug pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: chu yi dkyil 'khor shing rta dang // ce spyang rgyug pa lta bu'o //
translated: and like a jackal running.

original: sbyor ldan man ngag dam pa ni //
analyzed: sbyor ldan man ngag dam pa ni //
translated: The sublime oral instructions of the one who is endowed with the practice

original: dam pa'i zhal las shes par bya //
analyzed: dam pa'i zhal las shes par bya //
translated: should be known from the mouth of a holy one.

original: las dang rjes mthun 'khor ni /
analyzed: las dang rjes mthun 'khor ni /
translated: The retinue that is in accord with the activity

original: gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas na //
analyzed: gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas na //
translated: is explained in detail elsewhere,

original: 'dir ni mang du ma smos so //🔽ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
analyzed: 'dir ni mang du ma smos so // ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
translated: so it is not mentioned much here.🔽Yama raja sadome ya

original: ya me do ru na yo da ya /🔽ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
analyzed: ya me do ru na yo da ya / ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
translated: Yama me do ru na yo da ya🔽Yama da yo ni ra ya kshe ya

original: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
analyzed: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
translated: Yakshe yatsha ni ra ma ya

original: zhi ba'i mthar ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: zhi ba'i mthar ni sv'a h'a /
translated: At the end of the peaceful [mantra], svaha

original: rgyas dang dbang la aom dang ho //
analyzed: rgyas dang dbang la aom dang ho //
translated: For increase and power, om and hoḥ.

original: drag po phat kyis brtan par bya //
analyzed: drag po phat kyis brtan par bya //
translated: For wrathful [activity], stabilize with phaṭ.

original: phrin las bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: phrin las bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: The four activities will be accomplished.

original: rgyud dang bstan bcos mkhas pa bdag min te //
analyzed: rgyud dang bstan bcos mkhas pa bdag min te //
translated: I am not skilled in the tantras and treatises,

original: dam pa bla ma'i zhabs la brten nas chos 'di byas //
analyzed: dam pa bla ma'i zhabs la brten nas chos 'di byas //
translated: but this Dharma was made by relying on the feet of the holy guru.

original: rgyud kyi mngon rtogs nges par byin pa'i yon tan dpal //
analyzed: rgyud kyi mngon rtogs nges par byin pa'i yon tan dpal //
translated: The qualities of the one who bestowed the realization of the tantra, glorious🔽and endowed with faith, wisdom, and compassion, may they be liberated.

original: dang dang shes rab snying rjer bcas rnams nges sgrol shog / bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim //
analyzed: dang dang shes rab snying rjer bcas rnams nges sgrol shog / bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim //
translated: The stages of the ritual of approach and accomplishment,

original: zab mo'i sgrub pa rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: zab mo'i sgrub pa rnyed dka' ba //
translated: the profound practice that is difficult to attain,

original: nor bu lta bu'i gzhung 'di yis //
analyzed: nor bu lta bu'i gzhung 'di yis //
translated: May all beings become like the dark lord of death.

original: 'gro kun gshin rje gshed nag shog / khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po'i dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gro kun gshin rje gshed nag shog / khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po'i dus mthar phyin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
translated: The means of achievement of the dark lord of death, the king of wrath, which is the completion of the end of time, is finished.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i pandi tas mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i pandi tas mdzad pa'o //
translated: It was composed by the Indian master Śrī Paṇḍita.

original: rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rti sa rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rti sa rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The yogi-mendicant Prajñāśrījñānakīrti translated it himself.
